SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
Board
Represents the board, which consists of a grid of terrain tiles and manages piece placements.
Cat
Represents the Cat piece in the Jungle King game.
Dog
Represents the Dog piece in the Jungle King game.
Elephant
Represents the Elephant piece in the Jungle King game.
GamePanelController
Controller for the GamePanelView in the Jungle King game.
GamePanelView
GamePanelView class is responsible for rendering the game board and its components.
HomeBase
Represents a player's home base terrain in the JungleKing game.
HomeBaseView
HomeBaseView class is responsible for displaying the home base icons on the game board.
JungleKing
Controls core game logic and player turns.
JungleKingController
Controller component for the Jungle King game.
JungleKingDriver
Main entry point for the JungleKing Application.
JungleKingView
Main view class for the Jungle King game.
Lake
Represents a lake terrain on the JungleKing Game.
LakeView
Handles visual representation of lakes on the game board.
Leopard
Represents the Leopard piece in the game.
Lion
Represents the Lion piece in the game.
NormalTerrain
Represents normal terrain on the board.
Piece
Represents an abstract game piece in the Jungle King game.
Player
Represents a player in the JungleKing game.
Rat
Represents the Rat piece in the Jungle King game.
Terrain
Represents a terrain tile on the board that can contain a game piece.
Tiger
Represents the Tiger piece in the game.
Trap
Represents a trap on the board.
TrapView
Handles visual representation of traps on the game board.
Wolf
Represents the Wolf piece in the game.
